========

**Call for Tenders: Systematic Review/Evidence Synthesis Services**
################################################################

* **Title:** Systematic Review/Evidence Synthesis
* **Solicitation Number:** 1000249797

### Tender Details:

* **Deadline:** May 24, 2024 12:00 PM ET ( expiry: already passed)
* **Duration:** Initial contract period is from the contract award date to March 31, 2025, with up to two (2) additional one (1) year option periods.
* **Notice Type:** None specified

### Procurement Overview:

The Department of National Health is seeking the services of one or more Contractors to provide technical support for evidence synthesis reviews and methods training and support to support the recommendation development process of the National Advisory Committee on Immunization.

### Scope of Work:

The successful Contractor(s) will be responsible for conducting evidence synthesis reviews, providing specific technical requests related to evidence synthesis, and potentially offering methods training or support. The Contractor(s) will work on an "as and when required" basis.

### Key Documents:

The following attachments are available for review:

* [Link to RFP document](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/34143/1000249797--rfp.pdf)
* [Link to Amendment 1 document](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/34143/rfp-1000249797-amendment-1-en.pdf)
* [Link to QA document](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/34143/1000249797--qa-en.pdf)

### Contact Information:

For more information, please contact:

* Jeremy Mallon
* Phone: (613) 371-3237
* Email: jeremy.mallon@hc-sc.gc.ca

### Terms and Conditions:

The terms and conditions of this call for tenders are outlined in the attached RFP document. Interested Contractors should carefully review the document and submit their proposals according to the specified requirements.
